title: Vector Style
description: A 3D Tiles style with additional properties for Vector data.

show.description: If a feature should be shown.

color.description: The color blended with the feature's intrinsic color.

pointSize.description: The size of points in pixels.

pointOutlineColor.description: The color of the point outline.

pointOutlineWidth.description: The width, in pixels, of the point outline.

labelStyle.description: The label style: fill(0), outline(1), or both(2).

labelOutlineColor.description: The color of the text outline.

labelOutlineWidth.description: The width of the text outline.

font.description: The font of the displayed text.

backgroundPadding.description: The background padding, in pixels, of this label.  The `x` value controls horizontal padding, and the `y` value controls vertical padding.

backgroundEnabled.description: Whether or not to display the label background.

scaleByDistance.description: Sets near and far scaling properties of a feature based on the features's distance from the camera. A feature's scale will interpolate between the `y` and `w` values while the camera distance falls within the upper and lower bounds of the specified `x` and `z` value. Outside of these ranges, the features's scale remains clamped to the nearest bound.  If undefined, `scaleByDistance` will be disabled.

translucencyByDistance.description: Sets near and far translucency properties of a feature based on the feature's distance from the camera. A feature's translucency will interpolate between the `y` and `w` while the camera distance falls within the upper and lower bounds of the specified `x` and `z`. Outside of these ranges the feature's translucency remains clamped to the nearest bound.  If undefined, `translucencyByDistance` will be disabled.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: Sets the condition specifying at what distance from the camera that this feature will be displayed. The `x` value is the smallest distance in the interval where the feature is visible. The `y` value is the largest distance in the interval where the object is visible. If undefined, `distanceDisplayCondition` will be disabled.

heightOffset.description: The distance, in meters, to offset the height. This is ignored if the valuse is less than or equal to zero.

anchorLineEnabled.description: Whether or not to display a line from the feature to the point on terrain. This is ignored unless `heightOffset` is greater than zero.

anchorLineColor.description: The color of the line from the feature to terrain. This is ignored unless `heightOffset` is greater than 0.0.

image.description: A URL to an image or a data URI to be displayed instead of a point.
